# textColor

**Instance Property**

The text color of all characters in the receiver.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying @MainActor var textColor: NSColor? { get set }
```

## Setting text color

- **setTextColor(_:range:)**: Sets the text color of characters within the specified range to the specified color.
